section.section: The athletic trainer members may be appointed by the Board from a list of qualified individuals submitted to the Board by the Maryland Athletic Trainers Association, Inc.
The Board may request an additional list of nominees for each vacancy.
The term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Committee on October 1, 2009.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed.

text.section: From among its members, the Committee shall elect a chair every 2 years.
